tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (3/3) Interested in reading more? Check out additional correspondence from Barrett to then Secretary of State Hay, as he urges for sanitation protection to safeguard the health of workers from #malaria: 1) go.usa.gov/xvKAX and 2) go.usa.gov/xvKAR #FRUS #FSIatHome
